title.narrative: Credit and Financial Services: Sustainable Agriculture Investments and Livelihoods Project

description.narrative: Markets & VC integration will be addressed under Component 2 through the following sub-components, (i) Strengthening of ACs, WUGs and FMs through building on the successful experience of the WNRDP; (ii) Provision of extension services and training to farmers through various extension methodologies, and; (iiii) Marketing services for farmer cooperatives that demonstrate potential and interest in collective marketing activities.Rural Enterprise & Non Farm Employment objective will be achieved through Component 1 (Community and Livelihood Development Component) sub component (iii) focussing on vocational training and enterprise development that will finance the cost of providing community members, especially women and youth, opportunities for productive employment and enterprise development. Component 3 will provide access to financial services to the target households, rural enterprises and rural institutions with special emphasis on enhancing the access of women and youth to a range of affordable financial services and institutional optionsRural Organisations will be strengthened through Component 2 (Agriculture Development and Diversification) more specifically through the following sub-components, (i) Strengthening of ACs, WUGs and FMs through building on the successful experience of the WNRDP; (ii) Provision of extension services and training to farmers through various extension methodologies, and; (iii) Marketing services for farmer cooperatives that demonstrate potential and interest in collective marketing activities.

name.narrative: Credit and Financial Services: Sustainable Agriculture Investments and Livelihoods Project

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
